title: What is the opposite words for elo boost?
body:
wanna change my summoner name to antonym for elo boost

i looked up dictionaries but those are elo reduce , elo decrease, elo troll etc those are not look cool...

give me some cool examples!!

replies.body:
There's a word for "opposite words" it's called antonyms. That might help when looking for better antonyms.
Also my suggestion is **Tilt Streak**.
wow Tilt Streak is my Ranked life...maybe I should change to this name haha.
Only the ones that don't rig their games ;)

ahhhh, explains why mindstar doesn't tilt often then ~~    ;)   ~~
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Call yourself "bronze yoloq" - that is the opposite of elo boost

elo tilt
elo drop
elo plummet
elo tanked
bottomless elo pit *only just fits ;)*
elocant *+1 to whoever gets this*
drop the elo

I know they're not necessarily antonyms but I think they fit the theme reasonable well.
